attributes.action: Set up a Government of National Unity to manage the current Corona Virus Crisis.
attributes.additional_details: The country is facing an unprecedented crisis which goes way beyond party affiliations, policies. The crisis is still in its early stages and already there has been discord about decisions made. The population has been confused by the messages and would have greater confidence if the decisions were made by all MP's basing their decisions on full access to all information provided to the current Government.
attributes.background: In the present crisis it is necessary that the whole of government and Parliament abandons their party affiliations and all representatives of constituents everywhere are to have an equal input into information, debate and decision making in the national interest
